name: MoodyMonarch
description:
Your moody neighborhood monarch is annoyed and has sent their armies to your wall.

Attempt to keep the left-side wall safe. Unfortunately, your only option is to disturb the battlefield from afar - and you can't control your creations.

The game was created for the 2020 GMTK GameJam.
Theme: Out of Control

The player has no control over the battle, but can add disruptions to the battlefield. These may slowly grow out of control and potentially work against the player as they spread and move around.

Credits:

Graphics by Aleksandr Makarov (@IknowKingRabbit): https://itch.io/s/33219/iknowkingrabbit-bundle
